subject: Citi Field (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jody Gerut christened Citi Field with a leadoff homer, and the San Diego Padres spoiled New York’s first regular-season game in its glittering new ballpark with a victory.
snippet: Jody Gerut christened Citi Field with a leadoff homer, and the San Diego Padres spoiled New York’s first regular-season game in its glittering new ballpark with a victory.
